ygData.subject: Re: Revelations...
ygData.msgSnippet: Amen.   I have been on this message board since it started.   Watching, observing, and contributing ideas.    The whitemage has been on it from near the start
ygData.messageBody:
Amen. I have been on this message board since it started. Watching,
observing, and contributing ideas. The whitemage has been on it from near
the start also and contributed his fair share of ideas I doubt he is an 8
year old troll. He simply made one mistake when we posted that letter about
how he had the information for the pole. He apologized for it lets forget
about it and move on for all you new people. If you don't like what he has
to say or any info he has to contribute simply press the old delete button
whenever you see the thewhitemages name in your mailbox. Problem solved.
